entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 11:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -14.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -20.2°C
Wind: 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 except minus 17 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22 except minus 17 along the coast. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
